displayName: SOP - Change throttling settings for REST API Gateway
description: Change throttling settings for REST API Gateway. The script checks if throttling rate or burst going to be changed on more than 50%. If so, raises an error. Customers have an option to disable this validation by passing ForceExecution parameter or change throttling burst and rate with smaller increments
